description: Evaluate replacing grep/text search with coderef-context semantic search and code analysis. CodeRef context provides structure-aware search (functions, classes, relationships) vs grep's line-based pattern matching. Define migration path and use cases where coderef-context is superior.
notes: CodeRef context advantages: semantic search, call graphs, dependency analysis, complexity metrics. Grep advantages: simple text matching, speed for basic searches. Hybrid approach may be optimal.
